Courses

courses.Rmd

Courses and lectures based on the ped suite.

2021

  • Aug 18 and 25. Statistical power in missing person cases. Online lecture series for the Proyecto de Cooperación Triangular Argentina-Colombia-Unión Europea. Lecturer: Magnus Dehli Vigeland.
    • Lecture 1: Do we have enough data?
    • Lecture 2: Who should be exhumed?
  • Jul 28-30. Pedigree Analysis in R. ISFG Summer School - Virtual Edition 2021. Teachers: Thore Egeland and Magnus Dehli Vigeland. Course homepage.

2020

  • Jan 06-10. Statistical methods in relatedness and pedigree analysis. NORBIS 1-week intensive course, Oslo, Norway. Teachers: Thore Egeland and Magnus Dehli Vigeland. Course homepage.

2018

  • Jan 08-12. Statistical methods in relatedness and pedigree analysis. NORBIS 1-week intensive course, Oslo, Norway. Teachers: Thore Egeland and Magnus Dehli Vigeland. Details and program.

2016

  • Nov 16-19. Statistical methods in genetics using R. 4-day intensive course, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Teachers: Thore Egeland and Magnus Dehli Vigeland. Course homepage.
